modName: Desteros Follower Pack  CBBE  Etherial Elves  Dragonborn
summary: This mod adds 12 Followers to Whiterun and Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][size=5][color=#999999][url=http://www.ld-host.de/][img]http://www.ld-host.de/uploads/images/eaabd8021632762c9c9ea96d93a5888d.jpg[/img][/url]
LANGUAGE:[/color] [/size][/font][b][size=5][font=Georgia][color=#999999]English and[/color] German [/font][/size][/b][/center][center][b][size=5]
[/size][size=2]Ü[/size][/b][b][size=2]bersetzung des Plugin ins Deutsche von:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/4827500/?]TKHBMVP
[/url][/size][/b][size=2]"Folge dem weißen Kanninchen"
[/size]
[color=#b6b6b6]NEWEST VERSION:[/color][size=3] 1.01[/size]
[color=#666666][size=2]_________________________________________________________________________[/size][/color]

[color=#b6d7a8][b]Changelog[/b]

[u][size=3]V. 1.0 to V. 1.01:[/size][/u]

[size=2]1. Fixed Zylvinas eyes to the correct eye-set[/size]
[size=2]2. Added a Non-Lydia-Replacer Version[/size]
[size=2]3. Both Versions are available in both german and english[/size]
[size=2]2. Corrected wrong german names in engl. Versions[/size]
[/color]
[color=#666666]
_________________________________________________________________________[/color]


[u][b][color=#999999][size=5]1. DISCRIPTION[/size][/color][/b][/u]

[color=#999999]Hello Guys,

this package contains 12 Followers created by me, which are already downloadable
on steam and a few on the nexus. I created this package to make it easier for me to load even
more esps and to have all my favorite buddys in one load right at hand. And when it is easier for me, so it
might also be easier for you, if you like my followers and don 't want to have a wast number of
single esp-files in your loadorder, when you can have just one. 

For those who load my followers for the first time, you 're very welcome and can take advantage of
this ADVANTAGE right from the start and experiance 12 Followers with
different talents to support you in your quests. You can choose one Package in the files-section,
which may include a Lydia-Replacer or not, as you like.

[/color][u][size=5]1. BESCHREIBUNG[/size]

[/u]Moin,

dieses Gefolgsleute-Packet umfaßt 12 Follower, wobei es sich bei einem Follower um
einen ...ähm wie nennt man das jetzt im Deutschen??? Egal....REPLACER für Lydia handelt. Ich habe
dieses Paket geschnürt, damit ich einfach mehr esps in meine Ladereihenfolge packen kann und 
veröffentlicht habe ich es, damit Ihr ebenfalls in den Genuß kommt und nicht jeden Gefährten 
einzeln runterladen müsst. Ich hoffe dieser Plan war gut und meine Gefährten gefallen euch! ;)

Im Download-Bereich könnt Ihr zwischen verschiedenen Versionen wählen, z.B. gibt es auch eine 
Version ohne Lydia-Replacer.[/center][center][color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color][/center][center][size=5][u][b][color=#999999]
2. YOU NEED TO HAVE THE FOLLOING DLC[/color] / BENÖTIGTE DLCs[/b] [/u][/size][/center][center][color=#b6b6b6][size=2]( maybe I release a NO DLC-PACK aswell)[/size][/color]

[color=#6d9eeb][size=4]Dragonborn
[/size][/color][/center][center][color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color][/center]

[center][size=5][b][u][color=#999999]3.YOU NEED TO HAVE THE FOLLOWING MODS [/color]/ BENÖTIGTE MODS[/u][/b][/size]

[size=4][color=#3c78d8][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50339/?]Netchleather-armor by [b]Teh-Husky[/b][/url]
[/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/? ][color=#6d9eeb]calientes body replacer by [/color][b][color=#6d9eeb]Caliente[/color]
[/b][/url][color=#999999][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal by [b]Hello Santa[/b][/url][b][/b]
 (install after calientes body replacer /[/color] nach calientes body replacer installieren)
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?][size=4]ethereal elves overhaul [/size][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?][size=4]by [/size][b][size=4]nuska[/size]

[/b][/url][color=#666666]
[/color][/center][center][color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color][/center]

[center][size=5][u][b][color=#999999]4. ADDITIONAL MODS i AM USING AND ARE USED FOR SCREENSHOTS /
[/color] MODS, DIE ICH FÜR SCREENSHOTS BENUTZTHABE
[/b][/u][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15551/?]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15551/?]zoners high performance enb[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15551/?] by [b]Shrutesh[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence by [b]CaBaL- EmeraldReign-the AMB team
[/b][/url]
[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color][/center]

[center][u][b][size=5][color=#999999]5. KNOWN BUGS / [/color]BEKANNTE PROBLEME[/size][/b][/u][/center][center]
[color=#999999]If you place the esp to early in loadorder, Lydias face can look like vanilla again or
even strange... So best is to place it to the end or to a very late loading-position.

Load after "feminine femals.esp" if you use the mod, same problem like above.

[/color]Die esp dieser mod bitte möglichst weit am Ende der Ladereihenfolge plazieren, 
da Lydia ansonsten nicht das gewünschte Gesicht haben könnte und grau oder 
merkwürdig aussieht.

Die esp der Mod nach "feminine femals" laden, für den Fall, dass ihr diese Mod benutzt.[/center][center][color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color][/center][center]

[size=5][b][u][color=#999999]6. FINDING EACH FOLLOWER [/color]/ FINDEN DER FOLLOWER[/u][/b][/size]

[color=#999999]If you don 't know where to find Lydia, first of all: Welcome to the game!! [/color]
[color=#999999]You will stumbel upon her by helping the jarl of WHITERUN defeating the dragon. [/color]

[b][color=#cccccc]SII 'THARIE[/color][/b][color=#999999], and [/color][color=#cccccc]DANA[/color][color=#999999] can be found in [/color][color=#b6b6b6]"THE DRUNKEN HUNTSMEN" in whiterun.[/color]

[color=#cccccc]THOR 'HAL[/color][color=#999999] and [/color][color=#cccccc]NEVINE[/color][color=#999999] can be found in [/color][color=#cccccc]"THE BANNERED MARE" in whiterun.[/color]

[color=#cccccc]ANDSHANA[/color][color=#999999] and [/color][color=#cccccc]MEDINA[/color][color=#999999] can be found in [/color][color=#cccccc]"JORRVASKR" in whiterun.[/color]

[color=#cccccc]ZYLVINA[/color][color=#999999] can be found in front of [/color][color=#cccccc]RIVERWOOD, NEXT TO THE GATE.[/color]

[color=#cccccc]DIARA, LEANDRA[/color][color=#999999] and [/color][color=#cccccc]RUMBURAK[/color][color=#999999] can be found in[/color][color=#cccccc] "THE SLEEPING GIANT INN" in Riverwood.[/color]

[color=#cccccc]NADESHDA [/color][color=#999999]can be found in [/color][color=#cccccc]"THE RIVERWOODTRADER"[/color]
[color=#999999]I guess she is cooking the hell out of the cooking-pot there...[/color]


[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]

[u][color=#999999][size=5][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65157/?][img]http://www.ld-host.de/uploads/images/c6c3a9c5d605d6061c3665268d6cc086.gif[/img][/url]
7. DISCLAIMER[/b][/size][/color][/u]

[color=#999999]First of all:
 
Not many ever complained about it, but if my english isn 't very well, 
bear in mind: It 's not my nativ language!

All the followers were created by me, if there is a doubt, please have a look 
at my steam-account there is the total of all my mods. This mod does no questrelevant changes, 
so it can 't influence or damage your game at this point, as far as I know. 
Still, there is always danger using a mod, so i take no responsibility if it crashes your game, 
but this mod is cleaned with TESVedit so there is just the minimal thread like always when using a mod. 

[/color][u][b][size=5]7. KLARSTELLUNG[/size]
[/b][/u]
Alle in dieser Mod enthaltenen NPCs stammen von mir. Sollten Zweifel daran bestehen 
bitte auf folgendem Steamprofil nachschauen. Dort kann man alle meine Mods ebenfalls 
runterladen. Abgesehen davon übernehme ich keine Verantwortung, wenn euer Spiel 
aus was für Gründen auch immer abstürzen sollte, oder unspielbar werden sollte. 
Diese Mod ist mit TESVEdit von "dirty edits" gereinigt worden uns sollte keine größeren
Probleme verursachen. Der Lydia-Replacer betrifft keine Questrelevanten Spieleinträge,
Sondern nur solche, welche ihr Außeres und ihr Kampfverhalten sowie Ihren Gang beeinflussen. 
Es ist immer ein Risiko eine Mod zu verwenden, aber ich habe versucht dieses klein zu halten.

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197993479673/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850][color=#6d9eeb]My profile on steam
[/color][/url]
[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________
_________________________________________________________________________[/color]

[color=#999999][size=5][u][b]8. A SUGGESTION[/b][/u][/size][/color]

[color=#999999]Just a suggestion at the end of the discription: For less CDT-Issues in general
while playing the game, you should use LOOT for the right loadorder and TESVEdit aswell to get
rid fo so called "dirty edits". It 's not that difficult as it seems and I was able to
minimise crashes on my computer to nearly zero! Have a look a "GOPHERS" tutorials on
youtube to get to know how to handle these programms!

[/color][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SzoyWugzZAw]Gophers loot tutorial[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fw3g_N1jcZQ]Gophers TESVEdit tutorial
[/url]
[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________
_________________________________________________________________________[/color]
[b][size=5]

[size=3]Dest.[/size][/center]
